mapper.sql: sc.coupon_id, sc.coupon_no, sc.coupon_title, sc.coupon_detail, sc.coupon_type, sc.coupon_kind, sc.preferential_discount, sc.use_condition, sc.limit_money, sc.issuance_type, sc.consume_type, sc.STATUS, ( SELECT gs.gas_station_name FROM `sys_gas_station` gs WHERE gs.sys_gas_station_id = sc.sys_gas_station_id ) gas_station_name, sc.sys_gas_station_id, DATE_FORMAT( sc.start_coupon_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) start_coupon_time, DATE_FORMAT(sc.end_coupon_time, '%Y-%m-%d') end_coupon_time, (SELECT count(1) FROM `sys_user_coupon` su WHERE su.coupon_id = sc.coupon_id ) coupon_nums, (CASE WHEN now() < sc.start_coupon_time THEN '未开始' WHEN now() >= sc.start_coupon_time AND now() <= sc.end_coupon_time THEN ( CASE WHEN timestampdiff(HOUR,now(),sc.end_coupon_time) > 24 THEN CONCAT('优惠结束还剩', timestampdiff(DAY,now(),sc.end_coupon_time),'天') ELSE CONCAT('优惠结束还剩',timestampdiff(HOUR,now(),sc.end_coupon_time),'小时') END) WHEN now() > sc.end_coupon_time THEN '已结束' END) statusinfo
mapper.insert: insert into sys_coupon (coupon_id,coupon_no, coupon_title, coupon_detail, coupon_type, coupon_kind, preferential_discount,limit_money,use_condition,issuance_type,consume_type,status, start_coupon_time, end_coupon_time,sys_gas_station_id, create_person_id,create_time,lastmodify_person_id,lastmodify_time ) values (#{coupon_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coupon_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coupon_title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coupon_detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coupon_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{coupon_kind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preferential_discount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{limit_money,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{use_condition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{issuance_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consume_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{start_coupon_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{end_coupon_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{sys_gas_station_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{create_person_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{lastmodify_person_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lastmodify_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update sys_coupon set coupon_title = #{coupon_title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coupon_detail = #{coupon_detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coupon_type = #{coupon_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coupon_kind = #{coupon_kind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, preferential_discount = #{preferential_discount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, limit_money = #{limit_money,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, use_condition = #{use_condition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, issuance_type=#{issuance_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consume_type=#{consume_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status=#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_gas_station_id=#{sys_gas_station_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_coupon_time=#{start_coupon_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_coupon_time=#{end_coupon_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lastmodify_person_id=#{lastmodify_person_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastmodify_time=#{lastmodify_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where coupon_id = #{coupon_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT user_coupon_id, coupon_id, isuse, suc.user_coupon_id, suc.coupon_id, suc.sys_driver_id, suc.coupon_no, suc.isuse, suc.start_coupon_time, suc.end_coupon_time, sd.user_name, sd.full_name, sd.identity_card, sd.plate_number, sd.fuel_type, sd.station_id, sd.regis_source FROM `sys_user_coupon` suc LEFT JOIN `sys_driver` sd ON suc.sys_driver_id = sd.sys_driver_id WHERE 1 = 1 and suc.user_coupon_id = #{user_coupon_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select sc.*,suc.user_coupon_id,sys_gas_station.gas_station_name,suc.user_coupon_id from sys_user_coupon suc left join sys_coupon sc on suc.coupon_id = sc.coupon_id LEFT JOIN sys_gas_station ON sc.sys_gas_station_id = sys_gas_station.sys_gas_station_id where suc.isuse = '0' AND suc.sys_driver_id = #{driverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND sc.status = 1 AND (sc.sys_gas_station_id = #{sys_gas_station_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR sc.coupon_kind = 1) AND sc.start_coupon_time <= CURDATE() AND sc.end_coupon_time >= CURDATE()
AND ((sc.preferential_discount <= CONVERT(#{preferential_discount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},decimal) AND sc.use_condition = 1) or (sc.use_condition = 2) ) AND (sc.limit_money is null or sc.limit_money <= CONVERT(#{preferential_discount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},decimal))
AND ( sc.use_condition ='2' OR sc.limit_money+0 <= #{amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
order by CONVERT(preferential_discount,decimal) DESC,use_condition DESC,end_coupon_time ASC,sc.coupon_kind DESC

select sc.*,suc.user_coupon_id,sys_gas_station.gas_station_name from sys_user_coupon suc left join sys_coupon sc on suc.coupon_id = sc.coupon_id LEFT JOIN sys_gas_station ON sc.sys_gas_station_id = sys_gas_station.sys_gas_station_id where suc.isuse = '0' AND suc.sys_driver_id = #{driverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND sc.status = 1 AND (sc.sys_gas_station_id = #{sys_gas_station_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR sc.coupon_kind = 1) AND sc.start_coupon_time <= CURDATE() AND sc.end_coupon_time >= CURDATE()
AND ((sc.preferential_discount <= CONVERT(#{preferential_discount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},decimal) AND sc.use_condition = 1) or (sc.use_condition = 2) ) AND (sc.limit_money is null or sc.limit_money <= CONVERT(#{preferential_discount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},decimal))
order by CONVERT(preferential_discount,decimal) DESC,sc.coupon_kind DESC,end_coupon_time ASC,use_condition DESC

SELECT sys_user_coupon.coupon_id, sys_coupon.coupon_kind, sys_coupon.coupon_type, sys_gas_station.gas_station_name, sys_coupon.use_condition, sys_coupon.preferential_discount, sys_coupon.coupon_title, sys_coupon.limit_money, sys_coupon.start_coupon_time, sys_coupon.end_coupon_time FROM sys_user_coupon LEFT JOIN sys_coupon ON sys_user_coupon.coupon_id = sys_coupon.coupon_id LEFT JOIN sys_gas_station ON sys_coupon.sys_gas_station_id = sys_gas_station.sys_gas_station_id WHERE isuse = '0' AND sys_user_coupon.sys_driver_id = #{driverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user_coupon SET isuse='1' WHERE user_coupon_id = (SELECT user_coupon_id FROM sys_user_coupon WHERE coupon_id=#{0} AND sys_driver_id=#{1} AND isuse='0' LIMIT 1)
